description.narrative: The Project Development Objective is to scale up private sector investment in geothermal energy development in Turkey.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Loan and Grant Agreements: Schedule 2, Section I Paragraphs A.1. and A.2. | Description :At all times duringproject implementation TSKB and TKB shall operate and maintain Project Implementing Units with functions and responsibilities,qualified staff in sufficient numbers, adequate funds, facilities, services and other resources for the project implementation, allsatisfactory to the World Bank. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Loan and Grant Agreements: Schedule 2, Section II Paragraph B.1. | Description :TKB and TSKB shall maintainfinancial management systems in accordance with the provisions of Section 5.09 of the General Conditions. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Loan and Grant Agreements: Schedule 2, Section II Paragraph B.2. | Description :TKB and TSKB shall prepare andfurnish to the Bank, not later than forty-five (45) days after the end of each calendar semester, interim unaudited financialreports for the Project covering the semester, in form and substance satisfactory to the Bank. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Loan and Grant Agreements: Schedule 2, Section II Paragraph B.3. | Description :TKB and TSKB shall have theirentity financial statements and Project financial statements audited in accordance with the provisions of Section 5.09 (b) of theGeneral Conditions. Each audit of the Financial Statements shall cover the period of one calendar year of the borrowers. Theaudited financial statements for each such period shall be furnished to the bank not later than six months after the end of suchperiod. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement: Loan Agreement: Schedule 2, Section I Paragraph A.1.| The Borrower shall operate and maintain, until thecompletion of the Project, its Project Implementation Unit with functions, responsibilities, and adequate staffing and budgetaryresources necessary and appropriate for implementation of Part B of the Project, all satisfactory to the Bank.

Finance Agreement: Loan Agreement: Schedule 2, Section I Paragraph A.2.| The Borrower shall ensure that the PIU includes thefollowing minimum personnel throughout the Project implementation period: (i) one environmental safeguard specialist, (ii) onesocial safeguard specialist, and (iii) one occupational and health and safety specialist.

Finance Agreement: Loan Agreement: Schedule 2, Section I Paragraph C.| The Borrower shall carry out the Project in accordance withthe relevant provisions of the Project Operation Manual and shall not assign, amend, abrogate, terminate, waive, or fail to enforceany provisions of the POM without obtaining the prior approval of the Bank.

Loan Agreements: Schedule 2, Section I.A, Paragrahs 1 and 2| The Borrower shall operate and maintain, until the completion of theProject, its Project Implementation Unit with functions, responsibilities, and adequate staffing and budgetary resources necessaryand appropriate for implementation of Part B of the Project, all satisfactory to the Bank, including maintaining the followingminimum personnel: (i) one environmental safeguard specialist, (ii) one social safeguard specialist, and (iii) one occupational andhealth and safety specialist.

Loan Agreements: Schedule 2, Section I.D.| The Borrower shall ensure, and cause each relevant Geothermal Developer to ensure, thatPart B.1 of the Project is carried out in accordance with the provisions of the Safeguard Instruments and safeguard provisions ofthe Loan Agreement.

Loan Agreements: Schedule 2, Sections I.B and I.C| For the purposes of carrying out B.1 of the Project, the Borrower shall carryout the Subproject Financing in accordance with the provisions of the Loan Agreement and the Project Operations Manual and shallnot assign, amend, abrogate, terminate, waive, or fail to enforce any provisions of the POM without obtaining the prior approval ofthe Bank. In the event any conflict between the terms of the POM and those of this Agreement, those of this Agreement shallprevail.
